summary: THE DRIVER SIDE SEAT BELT BECAME UNLATCHED WHILE DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY.  *NLM  THE SEAT BELT HAS NOT WORKED SINCE THE ORIGINAL FAILURE.  THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD BY FORD , THE SEAT BELT WAS ONLY WARRANTED FOR FIVE YEARS BUT SEEMED TO CONTRADICT THE INFORMATION ON FILING A COMPLAINT.  *SCC    *JB
